response.value:
Introduction

The aim of this report is to introduce the main ways of transportation in our school to students, so that students can flexibly choose their own way of transportation.

Most popular transportation

The most popular transportation is riding a bike, which has many advantages ,such as it is environmentally friendly, healthy and cheap.However,cycling is slow in speed,so if you are in a hurry, you would better not taking a bike.It is no safe places for bikes, so it is easy to be steal.Whatsmore,it may cause sweating and you may need to change your clothes.

Second Most popular transportation
The second most popular is train travel, which has many advantages, it is also very friendly to the environment, and the speed is very fast, and it is convenient for us cause it is near the station. but cancelled due to weather issues,also can be congested during peak hours.

Recommendations
In general, based on the above, we give some recommendations. For students who ride bicycles, we recommend that schools provide changing rooms for students and find a safer place to park their bicycles. For students who take the train, they can choose the time period that is not the peak period for course selection.
